org.arl.fjage.rmi

Class RemoteContainerProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • org.arl.fjage.rmi.RemoteContainerProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, RemoteContainer

    public class RemoteContainerProxy
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements RemoteContainer
    RMI proxy to avoid having MasterContainer and SlaveContainer implement the UnicastRemoteObject interface.
    See Also:
    Container, Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
